trans-unit.source: Suggestions
trans-unit.target: Suggestions

trans-unit.source: Suggestions (Azure Search Service REST API)
trans-unit.target: Suggestions (Azure Search Service REST API)

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> operation retrieves suggestions based on partial search input.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> operation retrieves suggestions based on partial search input.

trans-unit.source: It's typically used in search boxes to provide type-ahead suggestions as users are entering search terms.
trans-unit.target: It's typically used in search boxes to provide type-ahead suggestions as users are entering search terms.

trans-unit.source: A code example demonstrating this feature can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search Suggestions Demo</linkText><linkUri>https://azsearchsuggestions.codeplex.com/</linkUri></externalLink> on Codeplex.
trans-unit.target: A code example demonstrating this feature can be found at <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search Suggestions Demo</linkText><linkUri>https://azsearchsuggestions.codeplex.com/</linkUri></externalLink> on Codeplex.

trans-unit.source: Suggestions requests aim at suggesting target documents, so the suggested text may be repeated if multiple candidate documents match the same search input.
trans-unit.target: Suggestions requests aim at suggesting target documents, so the suggested text may be repeated if multiple candidate documents match the same search input.

trans-unit.source: You can use <codeInline>$select</codeInline> to retrieve other document fields (including the document key) so that you can tell which document is the source for each suggestion.
trans-unit.target: You can use <codeInline>$select</codeInline> to retrieve other document fields (including the document key) so that you can tell which document is the source for each suggestion.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of this API in the .NET client library is the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.Azure.Search.DocumentOperationsExtensions.Suggest(Microsoft.Azure.Search.IDocumentOperations,System.String,System.String)</codeEntityReference> method.
trans-unit.target: The equivalent of this API in the .NET client library is the <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.Azure.Search.DocumentOperationsExtensions.Suggest(Microsoft.Azure.Search.IDocumentOperations,System.String,System.String)</codeEntityReference> method.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is required for service requests.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is required for service requests.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> request can be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> request can be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: The request URI specifies the name of the index to query.
trans-unit.target: The request URI specifies the name of the index to query.

trans-unit.source: It also includes the partially input search term in the query string.
trans-unit.target: It also includes the partially input search term in the query string.

trans-unit.source: As a best practice, remember to <externalLink><linkText>URL-encode</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.uri.escapedatastring.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> specific query parameters when calling the REST API directly.
trans-unit.target: As a best practice, remember to <externalLink><linkText>URL-encode</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.uri.escapedatastring.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> specific query parameters when calling the REST API directly.

trans-unit.source: For <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> operations, this includes:
trans-unit.target: For <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> operations, this includes:

trans-unit.source: URL encoding is only recommended on the above query parameters.
trans-unit.target: URL encoding is only recommended on the above query parameters.

trans-unit.source: If you inadvertently URL-encode the entire query string (everything after the <languageKeyword>?</languageKeyword>), requests will break.
trans-unit.target: If you inadvertently URL-encode the entire query string (everything after the <languageKeyword>?</languageKeyword>), requests will break.

trans-unit.source: Also, URL encoding is only necessary when calling the REST API directly.
trans-unit.target: Also, URL encoding is only necessary when calling the REST API directly.

trans-unit.source: Using the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search .NET client library</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn951165.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> handles URL encoding for you.
trans-unit.target: Using the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Search .NET client library</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn951165.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> handles URL encoding for you.

trans-unit.source: Query Parameters
trans-unit.target: Query Parameters

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The search text to use to suggest queries.
trans-unit.target: The search text to use to suggest queries.

trans-unit.source: Must be at least 3 characters, and no more than 25 characters.
trans-unit.target: Must be at least 3 characters, and no more than 25 characters.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The string tag that prepends to search hits.
trans-unit.target: The string tag that prepends to search hits.

trans-unit.source: Must be set with <codeInline>highlightPostTag</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Must be set with <codeInline>highlightPostTag</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Reserved characters in URL must be percent-encoded (for example, %23 instead of #).
trans-unit.target: Reserved characters in URL must be percent-encoded (for example, %23 instead of #).

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The string tag that prepends to search hits.
trans-unit.target: The string tag that prepends to search hits.

trans-unit.source: Must be set with <codeInline>highlightPreTag</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Must be set with <codeInline>highlightPreTag</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Reserved characters in URL must be percent-encoded (for example, %23 instead of #).
trans-unit.target: Reserved characters in URL must be percent-encoded (for example, %23 instead of #).

trans-unit.source: The name of the <languageKeyword>suggester</languageKeyword> as specified in the <languageKeyword>suggesters</languageKeyword> collection that's part of the index definition.
trans-unit.target: The name of the <languageKeyword>suggester</languageKeyword> as specified in the <languageKeyword>suggesters</languageKeyword> collection that's part of the index definition.

trans-unit.source: A <languageKeyword>suggester</languageKeyword> determines which fields are scanned for suggested query terms.
trans-unit.target: A <languageKeyword>suggester</languageKeyword> determines which fields are scanned for suggested query terms.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="1dbc2c8d-5dfb-4662-bf5c-acd289848985" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suggesters</link> for more information.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="1dbc2c8d-5dfb-4662-bf5c-acd289848985" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suggesters</link> for more information.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Default = false.
trans-unit.target: Default = false.

trans-unit.source: When set to true, this API will find suggestions even if there is a substituted or missing character in the search text.
trans-unit.target: When set to true, this API will find suggestions even if there is a substituted or missing character in the search text.

trans-unit.source: While this provides a better experience in some scenarios, it comes at a performance cost as fuzzy suggestion searches are slower and consume more resources.
trans-unit.target: While this provides a better experience in some scenarios, it comes at a performance cost as fuzzy suggestion searches are slower and consume more resources.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The list of comma-separated field names to search for the specified search text.
trans-unit.target: The list of comma-separated field names to search for the specified search text.

trans-unit.source: Target fields must be enabled for suggestions.
trans-unit.target: Target fields must be enabled for suggestions.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Default = 5.
trans-unit.target: Default = 5.

trans-unit.source: The number of suggestions to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: The number of suggestions to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: The value must be a number between 1 and 100.
trans-unit.target: The value must be a number between 1 and 100.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: An expression that filters the documents considered for suggestions.
trans-unit.target: An expression that filters the documents considered for suggestions.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A list of comma-separated expressions to sort the results by.
trans-unit.target: A list of comma-separated expressions to sort the results by.

trans-unit.source: Each expression can be either a field name or a call to the <codeInline>geo.distance()</codeInline> function.
trans-unit.target: Each expression can be either a field name or a call to the <codeInline>geo.distance()</codeInline> function.

trans-unit.source: Each expression can be followed by <codeInline>asc</codeInline> to indicated ascending, and <codeInline>desc</codeInline> to indicate descending.
trans-unit.target: Each expression can be followed by <codeInline>asc</codeInline> to indicated ascending, and <codeInline>desc</codeInline> to indicate descending.

trans-unit.source: The default is ascending order.
trans-unit.target: The default is ascending order.

trans-unit.source: There is a limit of 32 clauses for <codeInline>$orderby</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: There is a limit of 32 clauses for <codeInline>$orderby</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A list of comma-separated fields to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A list of comma-separated fields to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: If unspecified, only the document key and suggestion text is returned.
trans-unit.target: If unspecified, only the document key and suggestion text is returned.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Defaults to <codeInline>80</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Defaults to <codeInline>80</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: A number between 0 and 100 indicating the percentage of the index that must be covered by a suggestions query in order for the query to be reported as a success.
trans-unit.target: A number between 0 and 100 indicating the percentage of the index that must be covered by a suggestions query in order for the query to be reported as a success.

trans-unit.source: By default, at least 80% of the index must be available or the Suggest operation will return HTTP status code 503.
trans-unit.target: By default, at least 80% of the index must be available or the Suggest operation will return HTTP status code 503.

trans-unit.source: If you set <codeInline>minimumCoverage</codeInline> and Suggest succeeds, it will return HTTP 200 and include a <codeInline>@search.coverage</codeInline> value in the response indicating the percentage of the index that was included in the query.
trans-unit.target: If you set <codeInline>minimumCoverage</codeInline> and Suggest succeeds, it will return HTTP 200 and include a <codeInline>@search.coverage</codeInline> value in the response indicating the percentage of the index that was included in the query.

trans-unit.source: Setting this parameter to a value lower than 100 can be useful for ensuring search availability even for services with only one replica.
trans-unit.target: Setting this parameter to a value lower than 100 can be useful for ensuring search availability even for services with only one replica.

trans-unit.source: However, not all matching suggestions are guaranteed to be present in the search results.
trans-unit.target: However, not all matching suggestions are guaranteed to be present in the search results.

trans-unit.source: If search recall is more important to your application than availability, then it's best not to lower <codeInline>minimumCoverage</codeInline> below its default value of 80.
trans-unit.target: If search recall is more important to your application than availability, then it's best not to lower <codeInline>minimumCoverage</codeInline> below its default value of 80.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>api-version</codeInline> parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>api-version</codeInline> parameter is required.

trans-unit.source: The current version is <codeInline>api-version=2015-02-28</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The current version is <codeInline>api-version=2015-02-28</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="62ffee0b-ae3b-46c1-9ddb-a372d21c6f4d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Versions of the Azure Search Service REST API</link> for details and alternative versions.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="62ffee0b-ae3b-46c1-9ddb-a372d21c6f4d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Versions of the Azure Search Service REST API</link> for details and alternative versions.

trans-unit.source: For this operation, the api-version is specified as a query parameter.
trans-unit.target: For this operation, the api-version is specified as a query parameter.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the required and optional request headers
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the required and optional request headers

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>api-key</codeInline> is used to authenticate the request to your Search service.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>api-key</codeInline> is used to authenticate the request to your Search service.

trans-unit.source: It is a string value, unique to your service URL.
trans-unit.target: It is a string value, unique to your service URL.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> request can specify either an admin-key or query-key as the <codeInline>api-key</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Suggestions</languageKeyword> request can specify either an admin-key or query-key as the <codeInline>api-key</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The query-key is used for query-only operations.
trans-unit.target: The query-key is used for query-only operations.

trans-unit.source: You will also need the service name to construct the request URL.
trans-unit.target: You will also need the service name to construct the request URL.

trans-unit.source: You can get the service name and <codeInline>api-key</codeInline> from your service dashboard in the Azure Preview Portal.
trans-unit.target: You can get the service name and <codeInline>api-key</codeInline> from your service dashboard in the Azure Preview Portal.

trans-unit.source: See <externalLink><linkText>Create an Azure Search service in the portal</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/search-create-service-portal/</linkUri></externalLink> for page navigation help.
trans-unit.target: See <externalLink><linkText>Create an Azure Search service in the portal</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/search-create-service-portal/</linkUri></externalLink> for page navigation help.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Response:
trans-unit.target: Response:

trans-unit.source: Status Code: "200 OK" is returned for a successful response.
trans-unit.target: Status Code: "200 OK" is returned for a successful response.

trans-unit.source: If the projection option is used to retrieve fields, they are included in each element of the array:
trans-unit.target: If the projection option is used to retrieve fields, they are included in each element of the array:

trans-unit.target: Example

trans-unit.target: Retrieve 5 suggestions where the partial search input is 'lux':

trans-unit.target: Notice that <languageKeyword>suggesterName</languageKeyword> is required in a Suggestions operation.
